```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(DT)
library(readxl)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dashboards <- read_excel(here("files","Dashboards_online.xlsx"))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
dashboards$URL <- ifelse(grepl("^https?://", dashboards$URL),
 paste0("<a href='", dashboards$URL, "' target='_blank'>", dashboards$URL, "</a>"),
 dashboards$URL)
datatable(dashboards,escape = FALSE,options = list(searchHighlight = TRUE))
```
